casebody.data:
DOT
v.
HAYWOOD COUNTY. No. 628PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 14, 2005. Jeffrey W. Norris, for Haywood County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Department of Transportation) shall have up to and including the 19th day of October 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of September 2005."
